name: UPnP_Generic
description: Automatically add port mappings to router using UPnP SSDP for Arduino boards, running on nRF52, SAMD21/SAMD51, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, Teensy, etc. besides ESP8266/ESP32, using ESP WiFi, WiFiNINA, Ethernet W5x00, ESP8266/ESP32 AT-command WiFi
keywords: uPnP, SSDP, router, port-mappings, port-forwarding, update, wifi, ethernet, client, server, communication
